TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EdmSchemaAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class EdmSchemaAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class EdmSchemaAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 屬性，表示此組件 (Assembly) 包含在概念模型中對應至實體 (Entity) 類型的類別 (Class)。

span.span: Attribute that indicates that the assembly contains classes that are mapped to entity types in a conceptual model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會套用至包含實體類型的組件。This attribute is applied to an assembly that contains entity types. 雖然這個屬性只需要套用一次，但是您可能會套用這個屬性許多次。It is only required to be applied once, but it may be applied multiple times. 當會多次套用 Visual Basic 專案中的單一組件建構函式必須用來提供對每個參考的組件的概念模型是唯一的 GUID 字串值。When it is applied multiple times to a single assembly in a Visual Basic project, the constructor must be used to supply a GUID string value that is unique for each conceptual model referenced by the assembly.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string assemblyGuid) cil managed

param.name: assemblyGuid
param.span: 字串，它是組件中模型的唯一 GUID 值。

span.span: A string that is a unique GUID value for the model in the assembly.

summary.span: 使用組件所參考之每個模型的唯一值，初始化 類別的新執行個體 (Instance)。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a unique value for each model referenced by the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個建構函式以提供 GUID 的字串值是唯一的每個由相同組件參考的概念模型。Use this constructor to supply a GUID string value that is unique for each conceptual model referenced by the same assembly. 當您針對 Visual Basic 專案中的單一組件套用 許多次時，請這樣做。Do this when is applied multiple times to a single assembly in a Visual Basic project.
